DOC.brief_summary: The use desflurane elderly subject ( > 65 year old ) undergo general anesthesia endotracheal intubation result decrease POCD compare sevoflurane patient 's MAP within 20 % patient 's baseline cerebral suppression state index stay within moderately anesthetized range general anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: POCD Elderly Patients Following Desflurane Sevoflurane General Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( > 65 year old ) Scheduled elective surgery require general anesthesia LLUMC HSH Airway management expect include endotracheal intubation Expected surgical duration 120 240 minute Preexisting significant psychiatric disease mental status change Clinically significant cardiovascular , respiratory , hepatic , renal , neurological , psychiatric , metabolic disease Patient 's weigh > 50 % ideal body weight Men : Ideal Body Weight ( kilogram ) = 50 + 2.3 kg per inch 5 foot Women : Ideal Body Weight ( kilogram ) = 45.5 + 2.3kg per inch 5 foot Patients undergone general anesthetic within past 7 day Patient refusal
